messages.body:
$CCI Crown Castle elevates Levendos to COO role 

https://newsfilter.io/a/506701802fb648b89537c88100564506

links.title: Crown Castle elevates Levendos to COO role
links.description: Crown Castle International has named Chris Levendos chief operating officer - Fiber. He replaces James Young, who's retiring from the company and staying through February to ensure a smooth transition. Levendos joined Crown Castle in 2018, and is currently VP of Network Engineering and operations, in charge of the company's national fiber and small cell infrastructure network.
